title: Google lost my phone - how to seek refund
content:
Shipped my phone in for a repair...FedEx tracking indicates it was received by Google on 9/25. The repair page still says "waiting to receive device." 
I have contacted support several times and they keep saying that they're having a specialist look into it, but nothing has changed. 
How do I get a refund or replacement for what is clearly a lost phone?
